attributes.action: Give Gibraltar back to España, but demand the UK keeps a military presence on the Island as part of the agreement!
attributes.additional_details: I believe the UK has no right to Gibraltar, however I concede the Island is a strategic point in terms of the UK military and an entry point to the Mediterranean Sea. I therefore wish it becomes a territory of spain, but we remain a military presence on the island much like Cyprus. I see this as being an excellent opportunity to improve Spanish - English relations!
